SEARCH
Module overrungl.stb
Package overrungl.stb

Class STBImageWrite

java.lang.Object
overrungl.stb.STBImageWrite
public final class STBImageWrite extends Object
STBImageWrite relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • STBImageWrite refers to one or more preview APIs: Arena, MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use STBImageWrite when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
The STB image writer.
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
